data.title: engil S.G.P.S., S.A. (EGL) Dividends
data.meta_description: The previous Mota-engil S.G.P.S., S.A. (EGL) dividend was 12.77¢ and was paid 3 months ago. The next dividend is forecast to go ex-div in 9 months and is expected to be paid in 9 months. Check the payment calculator for the amount.
data.text:
Dividend Summary

The next Mota-engil S.G.P.S., S.A. dividend is expected to go ex in 9 months and to be paid in 9 months.

The previous Mota-engil S.G.P.S., S.A. dividend was 12.77¢ and it went ex 4 months ago and it was paid 3 months ago.

There is typically 1 dividend per year (excluding specials), and the dividend cover is approximately 1.0.
